snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu significantly expanded his power, creating the broadest coalition government in recent memory.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu significantly expands his power by striking a deal with the opposition leader Shaul Mofaz, creating the largest and broadest coalition government in Israel in recent memory; observers now wonder what Netanyahu, long seen as a pragmatist and master political tactician, will do with that power now that he has been freed from the demands of more ideological factions within his coalition. Photo (M)a

byline.original: By JODI RUDOREN; Isabel Kershner contributed reporting

lead_paragraph: JERUSALEM -- Striking a secret deal with the leader of the opposition in the small morning hours, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel significantly expanded his power on Tuesday, creating the largest and broadest coalition government in recent memory, one that no single faction can topple. The question now is what Mr. Netanyahu plans to do with it.

headline.main: Master Tactician in Israel Adds Power in a Deal
